SEARCH
Package hac

Class CartSessionController

java.lang.Object
hac.CartSessionController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/cart") public class CartSessionController extends Object
This controller is responsible for managing the cart session. adding/removing items to/from cart clearing cart session
See Also:
  • CartItem
  • CartSessionBean

  • Method Details

    • add

      @PostMapping("/") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> add(@RequestBody CartItem item)
      This method adds an item to the cart session
      Parameters:
      item - the item to be added
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with status code 201 if the item was added successfully or 301 if the item is already in the cart

    • remove

      @DeleteMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> remove(@PathVariable Long id)
      This method removes an item from the cart session
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the item to be removed
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with status code 200 if the item was removed successfully or 404 if the item was not found in the cart

    • clear

      @DeleteMapping("/") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> clear()
      This method clears the cart session
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with status code 200

    • delete

      @DeleteMapping("/delete") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> delete(@RequestBody ArrayList<Integer> items)
      This method removes multiple items from the cart session
      Parameters:
      items - list of ids of items to be removed
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with status code 200

    • get

      @GetMapping("/") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ArrayList<CartItem>> get()
      This method returns the cart session
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with status code 200 and the cart session

    • handleValidationExceptions

      @ResponseStatus(BAD_REQUEST) @ExceptionHandler({org.springframework.web.bind.MethodArgumentNotValidException.class,jakarta.validation.ConstraintViolationException.class}) public Map<String,String> handleValidationExceptions(org.springframework.web.bind.MethodArgumentNotValidException ex)
      This method handles validation exceptions and bad requests
      Parameters:
      ex - - exception to handle
      Returns:
      map of errors
